alert.note: Alert for Northwest Deserts (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 18 at 3:11PM MST until January 20 at 11:00AM MST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM THURSDAY TO 11 AM MST FRIDAY ABOVE 3500 FEET... * WHAT...Snow expected above 3500 feet. Total snow accumulations up to 4 inches possible. Southwest wind gusts up to 20 mph. * WHERE...Northwest Deserts. * WHEN...From 11 AM Thursday to 11 AM MST Friday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Plan on slippery road conditions on Buck and Doe Road, Hualapai Mountain Road, and Interstate 40 east of Kingman.
info.instruction: A Winter Weather Advisory for snow means periods of snow will cause primarily travel difficulties. Expect snow covered roads and limited visibilities, and use caution while driving. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
